title: Karl Muth - Jaguars and Lions
description:
What car would you build to live in Africa? Karl Knows. Karl Muth built a Jaguar XJ8L with an LS swap and Audi seats, and the video has 600k views on our channel. He's collected all kinds of cool cars, built a very interesting Toyota truck, and has all kinds of style. 

 

This show is available as a video! 

https://youtu.be/-AHsHnPuZH4

 

Karl built this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OTAXykiqsGs&t=28s


IG:

@haystack

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
